com.sb.elsinore

Class Temp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.Temp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class Temp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Temp class is used to monitor temperature on the one wire system.
    Author:
    Doug Edey
